data.title: Daisuke Gori
authors: Contributors to Video Game Audio Wiki

data.text:
Daisuke Gori was a voice actor affiliated with Ezaki Production and later Aoni Production.

Sadly, on January 17, 2010 from suicide caused by diabetes and retinal detachment at the age of only 57. His funeral was privately held per his wishes on March 1 of the same year. His roles were succeeded by other actors, including Naoki Imamura, Banjo Ginga, Ryuzaburo Otomo, Unsho Ishizuka, Katsuhisa Houki, Mitsuaki Hoshino, Tetsu Inada, Tsuyoshi Koyama, Ian Gibb, Fumihiko Tachiki, Jiro Saito, Shirou Gou, Koji Ishii, Yu Shimaka, Kenta Miyake, Kenji Nomura, Tatsuya Kobayashi, Naomi Kusumi, Hayato Fujii, Yasuhiko Kawazu, and Shirou Saitou.
